name: Gem Delivery
description:
Press S to start. WASD for movement. 
You win the game by successfully delivering the gems to the NPC at the end of the forest (although the game doesn't end itself).

Note: I was unable to export the game in an executable format, so in order to play this game, you would need to download Game Maker Studio 2 and import the game files, and then run the game in the program...
Update: I was able to export the game for windows yay!
